root.name: Populous: The Promised Lands
root.description: Populous: The Promised Lands is a data disk for Populous that was released in 1989 for the PC, Amiga, TurboGrafx-CD and Atari ST. Developed by Bullfrog Productions, Ltd. the disk contains five new landscape types and 500 maps for Conquest Mode. Among the new landscape types included are the following:Block LandSilly LandWild WestBit PlainsRevolution Francaise
